title: I got the best news of my life
body:
After my doctors appointment iv been told by my cancer doctor im cancer free! i know this has nothign to do with teh game but i felt like i needed to tell everyone

really the biggest news iv ever gotten in my life

replies.body:
Awesome, congratulations! 

Got any celebratory plans?
Hes going to play league duh XD
And therefore get cancer again.
I always wondered how people directly affected by cancer deal with cancer jokes. Like it seems kinda inappropiate but it's still funny, right?
its hella funny imo. if he really wanted to get rid of cancer he would have uninstall league a while ago.

Actually, Totalbiscuit on YouTube has a really interesting comment on that. As someone with cancer, he says that he quite frankly finds cancer jokes to be alright and uses them himself. I think it was something along the lines that he's glad we can all unite around cancer as being a bad thing, and it doesn't bother him to see it casually tossed about.

That's is not to say that some people won't find cancer jokes offensive, similar to how jokes about death tend to be difficult for some people to deal with. The important thing to remember is humor is a natural human response to a terrible thing and when using it you need to make sure that you are demeaning the terrible thing, not the people who suffer from it.

I had cancer at 18 and I still laughed at jokes about Yasuo being cancer

if you're not overly sensitive it's not a big deal
Given that his icon is Satan Teemo...

Riot comments like this are what makes the boards a good place. People screaming about balance and meddler is hear to tell one of the players gratz on his cancer removal.

And people say Riot doesnt care.

i wonder how long it took him to write 
Awesome, congratulations!

Got any celebratory plans?

Yeah it doesnt take long, but if Riot didnt care would anyone notice if no Rioter commented.

If no Rioter commented people will still be here congratulating this guy not thinking about wether or not Riot cares about there players. But the fact they DID take even that small amount of time, shows that they at least care a LITTLE bit.

EDIT: Hell i saw another post from a few days ago where RiotTantrum pulled some strings to get someone who was permabanned for saying HORRIBLE things to only a 14 day ban for the only reason being: EVERYONE in the game, both teams, knew who he was, they were shit talking and reported him as a joke. As dumb as that example is it still shows Riot members do go out of there way sometimes to help/encourage their players.

w0w thats cool, i got permabanned for asking for help on the boards. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/vXJF3Q2A-gets-a-chat-restriction-for-getting-flamed-by-4-people

riot cares a lot don't they. from 10 game chat ban to perma ban.
You Deserved it though

Congrats, man! Let's party!

*Pulls out roll of tape*

Scotch?
...take your punns and gtfo...

Should've just body switched no?
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/dragonball/images/3/3b/GokuAsCaptainGinyu01.png/revision/latest?cb=20100321194249

Anyway, Congrats!
don't worry, once you have an intentional feeder in your promos you'll get that cancer back in no time! (jk ofc)

Congratulations! 

https://media.giphy.com/media/dKsOHR4Sx6oRG/source.gif

My mother is recovering from cancer so your post gives me hope. :)

I just realized that this gif goes too well with the situation at hand. 
~From a fellow Toradora! fan.
I hope so to thanks everyone!

Whoops I dropped my bag of cancer...
https://gyazo.com/c8491a1b7dff258e0b7cc6205593f116.png

Doctor: Sorry Man, i have bad news for you.

whoooops.. dropped mine too

{{champion:157}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:55}}
You dropped this {{champion:126}}

WHOOP WHOOP HOP ON THE PARTY TRAIN, THIS IS AWESOME NEWS!!!

Congrats, man. This is awesome new and I hope that everything goes well for you from here on out.
Glad to hear you made cancer's nexus fall. Congrats!

Kill that cancer!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I was expecting you to have saved money by switching your car insurance.
Woo. Congrats bro.

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cnVRgO6h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-13T14:55:03.479+0000)
>
> Woo. Congrats bro.

Thank you!
im just so happy fuck cancer
If you hate cancer you might consider changing your summoner icon.

My sincerest congratulations to you and your family!! 

/Happy dance :D
You are gonna get cancer again from League.{{champion:79}}
as a fellow cancer survivor I congratulate you!!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I hope I get the same news after my own upcoming visit to the doctor.
As my summoner name suggests even though it isn't completely the correct spelling, we're supposed to be enemy's but today we are friends. Congrats mate and screw cancer
Congrats, friend!  I hope it stays that way for the rest of your days!!!!
I'm so happy for you brother! <3 Seriously fuck cancer! Keep up the awesomeness friend :)
Happy for you
Congratulations man. Lets celebrate by playing some league and drinking together over discord. XD
Con-Fucking-Grats dude!

Congrats!

http://media1.giphy.com/media/CkkVulYzFjd72/giphy.gif

If you want to stay like that, I'd advise against coming back to League! (trust me, I'm a med student) :P

Anyways, congrats! I'm really happy for you!

had a friend die of cancer a bit back

glad someone else managed to get away from it :D

add me bro, congrats on not getting cucked by life <3

> [{quoted}](name=Cresmont,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=cnVRgO6h,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-13T15:17:33.449+0000)

Thanks friend 

i aint done with life an life knows that
{{champion:157}} No cancer, eh?
Id like to take the time to thank every one of you for all your love!
